translation.en: [Belinda] We were coming out of the house.
translation.zh: 我们当时正在从家里出来

translation.en: This is gonna be my car in the driveway.
translation.zh: 我的车就在这里 在停车道上

translation.en: And then the Ford Expedition drove past…
translation.zh: 那辆福特征服者从门前驶过

translation.en: [Belinda] And you could just see every seat was filled.
translation.zh: 能看到每个座位都坐着人

translation.en: Crystal, Juan, and my son Justin
translation.zh: 克莉斯托、胡安和我儿子贾斯汀

translation.en: were getting in the car.
translation.zh: 正在上车

translation.en: [Justin] Get in the car, she popped the seat forward. I was like,
translation.zh: 我们上了车 她把座位往前推 我说

translation.en: "Scoot over. We're not hitting no main streets."
translation.zh: “挤一挤吧 我们不上主路

translation.en: "We're going three, four blocks up the road to 7-Eleven. Scoot over, sis." And, uh…
translation.zh: 我们只是去离这里三、四个街区的 那家便利店 挤一挤吧” 然而…

translation.en: We didn't even make it past the end of the street.
translation.zh: 我们连那条街都没走到头

translation.en: I get right up here.
translation.zh: 我走到这里

translation.en: I look over, and he's standing there, right by the stop sign.
translation.zh: 我往外看 他就站在那里 在停车标志牌旁边

translation.en: And the white Ford Expedition turns all the way around,
translation.zh: 白色的福特征服者掉头回来

translation.en: and he comes sliding back in, and he stops right here.
translation.zh: 他走到这个位置 停在了这里

translation.en: [Belinda] I race this way,
translation.zh: 我飞快地驶过

translation.en: and I stop to see what's going on with the kids.
translation.zh: 然后我停车想看看 那些孩子们在干什么

translation.en: [Justin] As we came around I look over, there's a guy with a hooded sweater
translation.zh: 拐过弯的时候 我看了一眼 看到一个穿帽衫的人

translation.en: with a gun, probably a foot and a half away from me.
translation.zh: 拿着枪 距离我大约半米

translation.en: [Belinda] I see the gun.
translation.zh: 我看见了他的枪

translation.en: And he was moving his mouth, like, trying to work his way up to it.
translation.zh: 他的嘴动着 好像在让自己做好准备

translation.en: Bang, bang, bang.
translation.zh: 砰

translation.en: [Belinda] And all the explosions, and the glass, the tires screeching.
translation.zh: 爆炸声 玻璃破碎声 轮胎摩擦地面的声音

translation.en: [dispatcher] We're getting several calls, more than four shots heard…
translation.zh: 我们接到几个电话 有人听到四声枪响

translation.en: [man] The shots were fired, and, uh…
translation.zh: 有人开枪…

translation.en: -[dispatcher] They shot at you? -[Belinda] They were shooting at me.
translation.zh: -他们对你的车开枪？ -对 他们对我开枪

translation.en: I just ducked down in the seat thinking, "Oh, my God."
translation.zh: 我在座椅上低下头 心想：“天呐”

translation.en: I don't even know if they hit the car.
translation.zh: 我都不知道他们是否打中了汽车

translation.en: I looked over at my sister and she was just, like, motionless.
translation.zh: 我看看我的妹妹 她就这样 一动不动

translation.en: -[dispatcher] What's the problem? -[woman] The car came just barreling in.
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 这辆车冲了过来

translation.en: -It's a Honda Accord. And they came up-- -[dispatcher] What color Honda?
translation.zh: -是一辆本田雅阁 他们过来… -什么颜色的本田？

translation.en: [Justin] We made it to right in front of a grocery store,
translation.zh: 我们来到一家商店门前

translation.en: right in front of the doors.
translation.zh: 就在门口

translation.en: I got out of the car, and I picked her up, and I'm sitting there holding her.
translation.zh: 我下车把她抱起来 我坐在那儿抱着她

translation.en: [woman] Someone's been shot that's on the floor. It seems like she's not responding.
translation.zh: 有人中枪了 在地上 好像没有反应

translation.en: Address is…
translation.zh: 地址是…

translation.en: And I felt her head, and…
translation.zh: 我摸摸她的头…

translation.en: [dispatcher] RP's going to be responding. It looks like we have a victim.
translation.zh: 报案者现在可以答复 好像有一个受害者

translation.en: [officer] Patrol, what's your twenty…?
translation.zh: 巡逻队 你们在哪儿？

translation.en: [Justin] God says, "Ask and you shall receive."
translation.zh: 上帝说：“祈求的 就得着”

translation.en: I did.
translation.zh: 我祈求了

translation.en: So where was he? He also says everything is according to his plan.
translation.zh: 所以他在哪儿呢？他还说 一切都是按照他的计划发生的

translation.en: What kind of fucked-up plan is that?
translation.zh: 这是什么狗屁计划？

translation.en: Where's the loving God in my life?
translation.zh: 我生命中那个仁爱的上帝在哪儿？

translation.en: [voice breaks] And I don't get it.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: I just want to know why, you know? Why?
translation.zh: 我只想知道为什么 为什么？

translation.en: [Jaimie] It was midnight, and my grandma was in the living room crying.
translation.zh: 当时是午夜 我奶奶在客厅里哭

translation.en: And they said, "Crystal's been shot."
translation.zh: 他们说：“克莉斯托中枪了”

translation.en: I said, "Crystal's been shot?" They said, "Crystal's been shot in the head."
translation.zh: 我说：“克莉斯托中枪了？” 他们说：“克莉斯托头部中枪了”

translation.en: The first memory of Crystal I have,
translation.zh: 我对克莉斯托的最初记忆是

translation.en: she liked to play baby dolls with me, and she would always ask me questions.
translation.zh: 她喜欢和我一起玩洋娃娃 还总是问我问题

translation.en: "Oh, Jaimie, did Annabelle get her bottle?" She would make, like…
translation.zh: “杰米 安娜贝尔有奶瓶了吗？”她会…

translation.en: She would make my playtime fun.
translation.zh: 她让我的游戏时间变得有趣

translation.en: And, uh, she really did. She opened my imagination.
translation.zh: 真的 她激发了我的想象力

translation.en: [voice breaks] She made sure that I knew that nothing's impossible.
translation.zh: 她让我知道 没有什么是不可能的

translation.en: Everything is possible.
translation.zh: 一切都有可能

translation.en: [Jaimie] And I went on MySpace.
translation.zh: 我登录聚友网

translation.en: [Jaimie] Tonight, a horrible tragedy has happened.
translation.zh: 今晚发生了一起可怕的悲剧

translation.en: I blogged about that. That's how I got my emotions out.
translation.zh: 把它写进我的博客 我用这种方式宣泄情绪

translation.en: I didn't cry at home.
translation.zh: 我没在家里哭

translation.en: [Jaimie] I just typed.
translation.zh: 我只是敲字

translation.en: I just let my fingers go and… type away.
translation.zh: 我只是任由手指敲击键盘

translation.en: The very last sentence:
translation.zh: 最后一句话：

translation.en: "Crystal, please be okay. I love you more than life itself."
translation.zh: “克莉斯托 求你一定要好起来 我爱你胜过生命”

translation.en: She didn't wake up.
translation.zh: 她没有醒来

translation.en: [Belinda] I remember her being here and,
translation.zh: 我还记得她在这里的情景

translation.en: just expect her to… walk through the door again.
translation.zh: 我盼着她再次走进门

translation.en: It's not going to happen.
translation.zh: 可是不会了

translation.en: [Belinda] When we think of our family and the good times, it's like,
translation.zh: 当我们想到我们的家人 和曾经的美好时光 感觉好像有人画下了一道线

translation.en: there's a line drawn.
translation.zh: 感觉好像有人画下了一道线

translation.en: Before Crystal and after Crystal.
translation.zh: 有克莉斯托之前 和有了克莉斯托之后

translation.en: She… She was just my pride and joy. I wanted a daughter so bad.
translation.zh: 她是我的骄傲 给我欢乐 我非常想要一个女儿

translation.en: Had three sons.
translation.zh: 我已经有三个儿子了

translation.en: And so the fourth one it was like, "Yay, got my little girl."
translation.zh: 所以老四出生时 我非常高兴 “哈 我有女儿了”

translation.en: She was my sunshine. She was my life. My life. Yeah.
translation.zh: 她是我的阳光 她是我的生命 我的生命 没错

translation.en: She would do anything.
translation.zh: 她什么事都愿意做

translation.en: She loved heights and roller coasters, and she was so lucky at the casino.
translation.zh: 她喜欢登高 喜欢过山车 在赌场手气总是那么好

translation.en: She went to a machine and put five dollars in it,
translation.zh: 她往赌博机里投入五美元

translation.en: and won $38,000.
translation.zh: 结果赢了三万八

translation.en: And started an air-conditioning heating business with her husband.
translation.zh: 和她丈夫一起开始做空调和供暖生意

translation.en: They just took off with it.
translation.zh: 生意很兴隆

translation.en: And then her husband fell back to drug use and the violence.
translation.zh: 后来 她丈夫旧习复发 又开始吸毒 变得很暴力

translation.en: And so Crystal left him and was back with us.
translation.zh: 于是克莉斯托离开了他 回来和我们一起住

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Just so many memories. God, just so many memories.
translation.zh: 好多回忆啊 上帝啊 好多回忆

translation.en: A lot of good memories too, but that one night,
translation.zh: 也有很多美好回忆 但那天晚上

translation.en: that's all it takes.
translation.zh: 全完了

translation.en: [man] Yeah, same tattoo on the neck.
translation.zh: 对 他脖子上有同样的纹身

translation.en: [Rick] We have a picture of a grim reaper that sits on the desk
translation.zh: 接下来轮到谁了 我们就会在他桌上

translation.en: of the person who's next up.
translation.zh: 摆一张死神的照片

translation.en: It's like death is always kind of waiting,
translation.zh: 就好像死亡永远在等着你一样

translation.en: and when you're at the top of the list, that's your case.
translation.zh: 等到轮到你了 你就接手这个案子

translation.en: You have no idea what you're going to catch. And it was my turn.
translation.zh: 你不知道会接到什么案 那天轮到我了

translation.en: [Rick] We've got a shooting over on the west end of the city,
translation.zh: 城市西区发生了枪击案

translation.en: so I get dressed, kiss my wife, drive in, and then your brain starts running.
translation.zh: 于是我穿好衣服 吻了我妻子 开车赶到 大脑开始飞速旋转

translation.en: My first murder case was a gang shooting. Those are always extremely difficult.
translation.zh: 我经手的第一件杀人案是黑帮枪击案 那类案件总是极其难破

translation.en: That one case, unfortunately, remains open right now.
translation.zh: 很不幸 那个案子至今未破

translation.en: There's still a guy out there that's gotten away with the ultimate crime.
translation.zh: 仍然有一个杀人犯至今逍遥法外

translation.en: I still think about it.
translation.zh: 我还会想到它

translation.en: Uh, my second one was the Crystal Theobald case.
translation.zh: 我的第二个命案就是 克莉斯托西奥伯德案

translation.en: I mean, I can't let two go. There's just no way that two are gonna go,
translation.zh: 我不能连着两起案件都破不了 绝对不行

translation.en: but it started off pretty rocky.
translation.zh: 但从一开始就不顺

translation.en: They had multiple casings at the scene,
translation.zh: 现场有多个弹壳

translation.en: right at the intersection of Greenpoint and Geranium.
translation.zh: 就在绿点路和天竺葵街交叉口

translation.en: [Rick] They had what might've been a shoe involved in it,
translation.zh: 他们发现了一只鞋 觉得可能与案件有关

translation.en: so they identified that for us.
translation.zh: 所以也帮我们调查了

translation.en: But I get a chance to see where evidence items are,
translation.zh: 但我有机会看到各个物证的原始位置

translation.en: photographs and measuring of evidence, video.
translation.zh: 物证的照片、尺寸、录像

translation.en: I'm… My brain was flooded, especially being new in the unit.
translation.zh: 我当时还是个新手 各种信息淹没了我的大脑

translation.en: It's almost like overload.
translation.zh: 几乎过载

translation.en: [cop] Riverside Police Department.
translation.zh: 河滨市警察局

translation.en: They had witness statements. Gone door-to-door.
translation.zh: 他们给目击者做了笔录 挨门走访

translation.en: We do what we call a canvass.
translation.zh: 我们做了所谓的“地毯式调查”

translation.en: -[cop] You didn't hear any gunshots? -[woman] We were inside tonight.
translation.zh: 你没听到枪声？ 今晚我们没出去

translation.en: [cop] You didn't hear anything or see anything?
translation.zh: -什么也没听见 没看见？ -我不在这儿

translation.en: -[man 1] I wasn't here. -[man 2] No, I was asleep.
translation.zh: -什么也没听见 没看见？ -我不在这儿 -没有 我在睡觉 -你在睡觉？

translation.en: [cop] You were asleep?
translation.zh: -没有 我在睡觉 -你在睡觉？

translation.en: Anyone that might have either ear or eyeshot of the incident.
translation.zh: 任何有可能听到或看到案发过程的人

translation.en: [cop] You didn't hear any gunshots?
translation.zh: 你没听到枪声？

translation.en: [man 3] No. My wife said she heard, you know, several pops, yeah.
translation.zh: 没有 我妻子说她听见了几声啪啪声

translation.en: [cop] She didn't see anything?
translation.zh: 她没有看到什么？

translation.en: There were a couple of detectives who were at the hospital.
translation.zh: 两个探员在医院

translation.en: They're trying to talk to the family,
translation.zh: 他们想询问家属

translation.en: but they're not being cooperative with the detectives.
translation.zh: 但他们不和探员配合

translation.en: I didn't like them. I didn't like them. Didn't…
translation.zh: 我不喜欢他们 我不…

translation.en: Didn't like them one bit and… you know, so…
translation.zh: 一点也不喜欢 你知道 所以…

translation.en: She wasn't exactly trusting of me. She didn't know who I was, and--
translation.zh: 她并不信任我 她不知道我是谁

translation.en: I didn't call the police to help me if I had an issue.
translation.zh: 如果我有问题 我也没有叫警察来帮我

translation.en: I didn't. It wasn't the police I called.
translation.zh: 我没有问题 我没报警

translation.en: They were coming at my family like we were the ones that did it.
translation.zh: 他们气势汹汹来找我的家人 好像是我们干的似的

translation.en: Threatening and telling my boys, "I'll lock you up."
translation.zh: 威胁我儿子 “我会把你们关起来

translation.en: "You know, if we catch wind of…" You know, that made me upset.
translation.zh: 如果我们听到什么…” 我很生气

translation.en: They put me in handcuffs and throw me in the back of a cop car
translation.zh: 他们把我铐起来 塞进一辆警车

translation.en: and interrogate me for hours.
translation.zh: 审问了我几个小时

translation.en: And I didn't get it, didn't understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白 不理解

translation.en: [Ben] Took the detectives and I told them, I said,
translation.zh: 我对那几个警探说

translation.en: "My family had nothing to do with this."
translation.zh: “我家人和这事无关”

translation.en: You want them to know I'm doing everything I can to help.
translation.zh: 你希望他们知道 我在尽全力帮他们

translation.en: That's all I'm here for.
translation.zh: 仅此而已

translation.en: Whatever you got going on, unless it's pertinent to my case, I don't care.
translation.zh: 不管你们有什么事 除非和本案有关 否则我不在乎

translation.en: I'm here to try and solve this homicide for you and your family,
translation.zh: 我只是尽力帮你和你的家人 侦破这起杀人案

translation.en: and to put somebody who killed Crystal away.
translation.zh: 把杀害克莉斯托的人抓起来

translation.en: So then, you know, we opened up a little more, but…
translation.zh: 所以 我们稍微配合一些了 但是…

translation.en: [Rick] There's a lot of rumors running around as to what might've happened.
translation.zh: 究竟发生了什么事 有很多传言 （警察问话 贝林达·雷恩）

translation.en: What are you thinking is…?
translation.zh: 你认为是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Belinda] I'm thinking there's been a lot of gang problems with that, uh, 5150.
translation.zh: 我认为那里一直有黑帮活动… 5150帮

translation.en: [Rick] This is what we call the West End.
translation.zh: 这里是所谓的西区

translation.en: This kind of loop is where the actual shooting took place,
translation.zh: 这个圈就是枪击案发生的地方

translation.en: but even more so where 5150 claim territory.
translation.zh: 也是5150帮的势力范围

translation.en: [Rick] But there were also multiple other gangs, Black, Hispanic,
translation.zh: 但此外还有其他许多帮会 黑人帮会 拉丁裔的帮会

translation.en: who laid claim to the same area.
translation.zh: 也说那是他们的地盘

translation.en: So there's turf wars, and guys that see each other. There'll be conflict.
translation.zh: 所以会爆发领地之争 一见面就会打起来

translation.en: [reporter] Rival Latino and Black gangs involved in drug trafficking…
translation.zh: （敌对的拉丁裔帮会和黑人帮会 参与了毒品交易…）

translation.en: [Rick] 5150 kind of came into existence for us in Riverside around 2003, give or take.
translation.zh: 大约在2003年前后 5150帮进入了我们的视野

translation.en: They tried to establish themselves and made some inroads
translation.zh: 他们想要发展壮大

translation.en: into being a particularly violent and confrontational gang,
translation.zh: 走暴力对抗路线

translation.en: graduating to assaults, to shootings, to then, uh, murdering three people
translation.zh: 两年半到三年时间 就在城里做下了

translation.en: within the city in the course of two and a half to three years.
translation.zh: 斗殴、枪击等案 还杀死了三个人

translation.en: It was a very quick evolution.
translation.zh: 发展得很快

translation.en: [Mario] We're in Riverside now.
translation.zh: 这就是河滨市

translation.en: All kinds of shootings, and every night people will get stabbed, robbed.
translation.zh: 各种枪击案 每天晚上 都有人被刀捅 被抢劫

translation.en: As soon as people heard 5150, like, they got scared.
translation.zh: 5150帮让人们闻之色变

translation.en: You know, they said we were murderers. We're killers.
translation.zh: 他们说 我们是杀人犯 我们是杀手

translation.en: Never once did I ever think that society would look at us like that.
translation.zh: 我从没想过有一天社会 会这样看我们

translation.en: Originally Riverside was, uh… It was kind of like an outcast from L.A.
translation.zh: 最初 河滨市就像是 洛杉矶的放逐之地

translation.en: All the people that couldn't afford to live in L.A. or in Orange County,
translation.zh: 没钱住在洛杉矶或橘郡的人

translation.en: they came out to Riverside.
translation.zh: 都来到河滨市

translation.en: So a lot of, I would say poor people.
translation.zh: 所以很多人都可以说是穷人

translation.en: I don't think we ever even went to, like, the beach or Disneyland.
translation.zh: 我们从没去过海滩或迪士尼乐园

translation.en: Nothing like that ever.
translation.zh: 那一类的活动 从来没有过

translation.en: We never experienced anything outside of, like, that area.
translation.zh: 我们从没体验过那个地区以外的世界

translation.en: So we thought that that was life.
translation.zh: 所以我们认为那就是生活

translation.en: Fifty-one, fifty, it was like me and my cousins or family members
translation.zh: 5150帮像是我和我的表兄弟 家族成员之间相互支持的组织

translation.en: backing each other up. That was the whole motive.
translation.zh: 5150帮像是我和我的表兄弟 家族成员之间相互支持的组织 那就是我们的全部动机 我们是一家人 如此而已

translation.en: Like, we're family. That was it.
translation.zh: 那就是我们的全部动机 我们是一家人 如此而已

translation.en: We would all be out here. Nothing really happening.
translation.zh: 我们会在这里玩 什么事也没有

translation.en: We were all under 18 years old, you know.
translation.zh: 我们都不到18岁

translation.en: When we were kids, uh, you know, everybody targeted us.
translation.zh: 我们小时候 人人都瞄准我们

translation.en: [Rick] Give me a full description of this--
translation.zh: 详细描述一下…

translation.en: [Belinda] He was young. He was young. He was a kid.
translation.zh: 他很年轻 是个小孩

translation.en: -But if I see him, I will know him. -[Rick] Okay.
translation.zh: -如果见到他 我会认出来 -好

translation.en: [Belinda] Then there was more interviews and looking at pictures.
translation.zh: 后来又有更多次问话 看照片

translation.en: [Rick] This particular binder has got all the different gang members.
translation.zh: 这份文件夹里是所有的黑帮成员

translation.en: And it kind of helps me to keep track of who's who in the zoo.
translation.zh: 帮我摸清这一带都有谁

translation.en: I do remember Belinda telling me the shooter had been a really young,
translation.zh: 我记得贝林达告诉我 枪手很年轻

translation.en: almost white-looking Hispanic guy, like a real baby face.
translation.zh: 拉丁裔 相貌接近白人 有一张娃娃脸

translation.en: She saw his face, and she'd absolutely be able to identify him.
translation.zh: 她见过他的脸 一定能认出他来

translation.en: Wouldn't be a problem.
translation.zh: 应该没问题

translation.en: This is the sketch that was drawn based off the information provided by Belinda.
translation.zh: 这是根据贝林达提供的信息 绘制的肖像

translation.en: I looked through annuals, yearbooks,
translation.zh: 我查了年鉴 毕业纪念册

translation.en: looking for people who are gang members
translation.zh: 查找帮会成员中

translation.en: and have a current picture I can look at.
translation.zh: 有近照的

translation.en: I'm talking with Belinda, I say, "I got pictures I want you to look at."
translation.zh: 我找到贝林达 我说： “我有些照片 想请你看看”

translation.en: She starts going through the pictures.
translation.zh: 她开始看照片

translation.en: And she gets to a young kid.
translation.zh: 看到一个小孩

translation.en: And she stops
translation.zh: 她停住了

translation.en: and says, "That's him."
translation.zh: 说：“就是他”

translation.en: One day Detective Wheeler called and said that, uh,
translation.zh: 一天 维勒探员打来电话说

translation.en: they have somebody they think might be involved in it,
translation.zh: 他们找到一个人 可能与本案有关

translation.en: and if they could drive me down there to get a look at him.
translation.zh: 能不能带我去认一认

translation.en: And she IDs him. "That's him. That's the guy."
translation.zh: 她把他认出来了 “是他 就是他”

translation.en: [Rick] You doing okay, dude?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: We start pressing him on this case and ask him where he was,
translation.zh: 我们开始审问他 问他当时在哪儿

translation.en: and he's given us a particular alibi as to where he was, who he was with.
translation.zh: 他给了我们非常明确的不在场证明 当时在哪儿 和谁在一起

translation.en: [suspect] I wasn't there.
translation.zh: 我不在场

translation.en: [Rick] I know that you were, though. I got somebody who identified you.
translation.zh: 我知道你在 有人认出你了

translation.en: I'm telling him, "We're gonna check this out."
translation.zh: 我告诉他：“我们会核实的

translation.en: "Don't lie. I'll find out if you're lying to me."
translation.zh: 别对我说谎 如果你说谎 我会查出来的”

translation.en: We were at my house, and then we went to his brother's girlfriend's house.
translation.zh: 我们先是在我家 然后我们去了 他哥哥女朋友的家

translation.en: [Ricky] He's saying, "I wasn't there."
translation.zh: 他说：“我不在场

translation.en: "I was over at a friend's house. I was with a friend. You can call them."
translation.zh: 我在一个朋友家 和朋友在一起 你可以问他们

translation.en: "You can check with them." I get a couple of my partners
translation.zh: 你可以找他们核实” 我请几个同事去核实他的不在场证明

translation.en: to go over and verify his alibi.
translation.zh: 我请几个同事去核实他的不在场证明

translation.en: And it's solid.
translation.zh: 结果证明很可信

translation.en: [suspect crying] Please!
translation.zh: 求你了！

translation.en: Let me go home! [crying] Let me go gome.
translation.zh: 让我回家！

translation.en: [Rick] So now I'm starting to think, "Uh-oh, I got a bad ID here?"
translation.zh: 所以我开始想： “哎哟 我们认错人了？

translation.en: "That's not a good start."
translation.zh: 这可不是良好的开端”

translation.en: And we ended up sending him home.
translation.zh: 我们就让他回家了

translation.en: They really didn't explain things to me well enough,
translation.zh: 他们真的没有解释清楚

translation.en: like you make one mistake and identify somebody that's not involved,
translation.zh: “认错了一个人 他并没有参与本案”

translation.en: they can no longer use what you have to say when it comes to court.
translation.zh: 结果到法庭上 你说的一切都不能采信了

translation.en: So that complicated the case for the detective.
translation.zh: 所以 对于那个探员来说 案件变得更加复杂

translation.en: You start off with a case very optimistic.
translation.zh: 我刚一接手时非常乐观

translation.en: We'll handle this. This is gonna get done.
translation.zh: 我们能处理好 会破案的

translation.en: Then you reach a point to where there aren't any more leads,
translation.zh: 然后走到了再无任何线索的地步

translation.en: and… and now it's almost a war of attrition.
translation.zh: 然后走到了再无任何线索的地步 几乎成了一场消耗战

translation.en: [Belinda] And I promised her.
translation.zh: 我答应过她

translation.en: It was the last thing I got to say to her, besides "I love you."
translation.zh: 除了“我爱你” 那是我对她说的最后一句话

translation.en: I promised her that I was gonna get him
translation.zh: 我向她保证我会不遗余力找到凶手

translation.en: if it's the last thing I do. I'm gonna get him. They're gonna pay.
translation.zh: 我向她保证我会不遗余力找到凶手 我会抓住他 他们要付出代价

translation.en: [Jaimie] I guess I was, uh, talking to Nick on MySpace,
translation.zh: 我当时好像是在聚友网上和尼克聊天

translation.en: and he had told me how the guys,
translation.zh: 他告诉我

translation.en: the people involved, had MySpace.
translation.zh: 参与本案的人也有聚友网账号

translation.en: He said, "They all have profiles."
translation.zh: 他说：“他们都有个人资料”

translation.en: [Nick] I pretty much, like, knew it was 5150 already.
translation.zh: 我基本上已经知道是5150帮干的了

translation.en: You know the streets talk, like, you just hear stuff.
translation.zh: 你知道人们在街面上什么都说 你会听到一些风声

translation.en: I mean, little by little you find out.
translation.zh: 渐渐的 你就知道了

translation.en: I was young. I was just a kid when she passed away.
translation.zh: 我当时很小 她去世时 我还是个孩子

translation.en: I was maybe 13 years old, so at that time when that happened,
translation.zh: 事发时我大概13岁 所以那时候

translation.en: I didn't really know about gangs.
translation.zh: 我根本不知道黑帮是什么

translation.en: [Jaimie] I talked to Aunt Belinda. I said,
translation.zh: 我对贝林达姨妈说：

translation.en: "MySpace. I can go on there. I can search for you."
translation.zh: “我可以去聚友网上替你查找

translation.en: "Get information for you."
translation.zh: 替你收集信息”

translation.en: [Belinda] I knew nothing about the social media. I wasn't on the MySpace.
translation.zh: 我对社交媒体一无所知 我也不上聚友网

translation.en: She said, "How do you do it?" I said, "I can do it all. Don't worry."
translation.zh: 她说：“怎么弄？” 我说：“都交给我吧 别担心”

translation.en: I was 14.
translation.zh: 我当时14岁

translation.en: About to turn 15.
translation.zh: 快15岁了

translation.en: [Lauer] If you've got a teenager at home,
translation.zh: 如果你家有个十几岁的孩子

translation.en: chances are that he or she spends a lot of time
translation.zh: 那么他或她很可能会

translation.en: on the social networking website called MySpace.com.
translation.zh: 在一个叫聚友网的社交网站上 花很多时间

translation.en: I knew everything about it. The ins and outs.
translation.zh: 我熟悉关于它的一切 从里到外

translation.en: How to make it look like this, how to make this pop up in your text,
translation.zh: 怎么把它弄成这样 怎么在文字里插入这样的图片

translation.en: how to make colored text, everything.
translation.zh: 怎么把文字弄成彩色的 所有一切

translation.en: [reporter] With 66 million users nationwide,
translation.zh: 聚友网在全国有6600万用户

translation.en: MySpace is one of the most popular networking sites used by kids.
translation.zh: 是未成年人中最受欢迎的网站

translation.en: Most of the kids at my school use MySpace.
translation.zh: 学校里几乎每个小孩都用聚友网

translation.en: You put pictures up. Meet girls, guys.
translation.zh: 你上传图片 认识女生或男生

translation.en: It was brand-new, popular. Everyone wanted to be on it.
translation.zh: 它是全新的东西 很受欢迎 所有人都想上去

translation.en: I was obsessed with it.
translation.zh: 我对它很痴迷

translation.en: I was excited. You want to give me this chance?
translation.zh: 我很激动 你想把这个机会给我吗？

translation.en: You want to give me responsibility?
translation.zh: 你想交给我一份任务？

translation.en: I thought to myself, "How can I snoop better?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“怎么才能更好地侦察？”

translation.en: [Belinda] So Jaimie
translation.zh: 于是 杰米在谷歌上搜到一张图片 找到一个漂亮的女孩

translation.en: Googled a picture and found a pretty girl.
translation.zh: 于是 杰米在谷歌上搜到一张图片 找到一个漂亮的女孩 （漂亮女孩 聚友网）

translation.en: [Jaimie] She had a Supergirl shirt on.
translation.zh: 她穿着一件女超人的衬衫

translation.en: I was like, "You're gonna be my Supergirl."
translation.zh: 我心里说：“你就是我的女超人了”

translation.en: I just wanted a pretty face, a pretty body,
translation.zh: 我只想要一个漂亮脸蛋、漂亮的身材

translation.en: and it was gonna be my brain behind it.
translation.zh: 而我是背后的智囊

translation.en: [Belinda] And we named her Rebecca, and we posted that up.
translation.zh: 我们给她取名瑞贝卡 发到了网上

translation.en: [Jaimie] I made her in the eyes of what I thought the gang members would like.
translation.zh: 我把她塑造成 黑帮成员可能会喜欢的样子

translation.en: Added in, "Smoke weed, and I like to drink beer."
translation.zh: 加上“抽大麻 喜欢喝啤酒”

translation.en: But I said cerveza because I thought it was more clever.
translation.zh: 但我又把“啤酒”换成西班牙语 因为我想这样更聪明

translation.en: I wanted them to 100% think, "This girl on this MySpace is real."
translation.zh: 我想让他们完全相信 聚友网上的这个女孩是真的

translation.en: I had the top eight.
translation.zh: 我有前八个用户 我把他们都加成了好友

translation.en: I befriended all of them. Clicked on that person's profile,
translation.zh: 我有前八个用户 我把他们都加成了好友 点那个人的头像 访问他的前八名好友

translation.en: went to their top eight,
translation.zh: 点那个人的头像 访问他的前八名好友

translation.en: added all of their top eight.
translation.zh: 把他们的前八名好友也加上

translation.en: You got clicked, and everyone got clicked, and everyone got added,
translation.zh: 有人点你 每个人都被点击 每个人都被加为好友

translation.en: and I just kept adding and adding until I had a MySpace full of guys
translation.zh: 我一直加啊加 直到 我的聚友网账户加满了男生

translation.en: that were 5150, and it looked like I belonged.
translation.zh: 他们都是5150成员 看起来我和他们是同类

translation.en: I said, "Aunt Belinda, I got it set up. What do you want me to do?"
translation.zh: 我说：“贝林达姨妈 我都安排好了 你想要我做什么？”

translation.en: "Get as much information as you can."
translation.zh: “收集信息 越多越好”

translation.en: [Jaimie] I was making them like me. Just making them trust me.
translation.zh: 我只是让他们喜欢我 让他们相信我

translation.en: [Belinda] They don't even spell a word out.
translation.zh: 他们甚至不把单词拼写完整

translation.en: I had to ask, I go, "What does LOL mean?"
translation.zh: 我还得问：“LOL是什么意思？“

translation.en: My typing was acting. That's what my acting was.
translation.zh: 打字就是我的表演 那就是我在演戏

translation.en: [Belinda] Just trying to find out where they were from, what they were doing.
translation.zh: 我只是想知道 他们来自哪里 在干什么

translation.en: Of course, I knew that they were driving a white Ford Expedition that night.
translation.zh: 当然 我知道那天晚上 他们开着一辆白色福特征服者

translation.en: She wanted me to start prying for information real quick.
translation.zh: 她想让我尽快搞到信息

translation.en: And I was like, "No, no, no, I gotta play it out."
translation.zh: 我说：“不行 我得放长线

translation.en: "Let me do this in, like, a week."
translation.zh: 给我一周时间”

translation.en: Give me three days at least before I start being like,
translation.zh: 至少要给我三天 我才能问：

translation.en: "Hey, what car do you drive?"
translation.zh: “嘿 你开什么车？”

translation.en: Okay. He had the white Ford Expedition.
translation.zh: 好 他有白色福特征服者

translation.en: Yeah, two of them.
translation.zh: 对 两辆

translation.en: That even made it even more confusing too.
translation.zh: 这就更加让人糊涂了

translation.en: With the witnesses and everybody,
translation.zh: 目击者和所有人都搞不清

translation.en: because the two vehicles the same color.
translation.zh: 因为两辆车颜色一样

translation.en: I… I remember at some point early on, we talked about the vehicles in the area.
translation.zh: 我记得一开始 我们讨论过这一带的汽车

translation.en: Okay, this one's Robbie.
translation.zh: 好 这个是罗比

translation.en: [Rick] Neighbors had seen a couple of vehicles.
translation.zh: 邻居们看见几辆车

translation.en: Some described them as SUVs,
translation.zh: 有人说是SUV

translation.en: like Expeditions or something of that nature.
translation.zh: 比如征服者这类的车型

translation.en: They were parked right here.
translation.zh: 它们就停在这儿

translation.en: [Rick] Doing laps in the area almost as if they were chasing each other.
translation.zh: 在这一带兜圈子 好像在彼此追逐

translation.en: I remember asking them about that. "You saw it? Know what happened?"
translation.zh: 记得我问他们 “你们看见了吗？ 知道怎么回事吗？

translation.en: "You were getting in your cars to go somewhere else
translation.zh: 这些车在这一带高速飞驶的时候

translation.en: about the time that these vehicles were speeding through the area."
translation.zh: 你们正好准备上车外出”

translation.en: And I can remember them playing kind of dumb about it.
translation.zh: 我记得他们有点装糊涂

translation.en: Yeah, there… there was a little bit. Um…
translation.zh: 嗯 是有一点

translation.en: I didn't come forth with everything that I knew right away.
translation.zh: 我没有立刻把我知道的全都说出来

translation.en: [Rick] Where was Robert when this happened?
translation.zh: 事发时 罗伯特在哪儿？

translation.en: [Belinda] Robert? I don't know. Robert had nothing to do with this.
translation.zh: 罗伯特？我不知道 罗伯特和这事无关

translation.en: [Rick] Sure. Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: [interviewer] So you tell the story of that night, you don't mention Robbie.
translation.zh: 所以 你讲了当晚的事 而你没有提罗伯特

translation.en: [Belinda] Oh, yeah, because that had happened before,
translation.zh: 对 因为那是之前发生的

translation.en: but then that just kind of went out the door.
translation.zh: 但后来就忘了

translation.en: I mean, I wasn't even thinking about where Robbie went.
translation.zh: 我甚至没有考虑罗比在哪儿

translation.en: I went to go find Robbie.
translation.zh: 我去找罗比了

translation.en: And we were getting ready to go to the store, and--
translation.zh: 我们正准备去买东西

translation.en: It turned out later on that the older brother, Robert,
translation.zh: 后来我们了解到 哥哥罗伯特

translation.en: was actually one of the vehicles being chased,
translation.zh: 其实就是被追逐的车辆之一

translation.en: and they didn't offer that up for quite a while.
translation.zh: 这一点他们过了很久才说

translation.en: [Rick] So this whole thing starts with Robbie
translation.zh: 一开始 罗比把车

translation.en: parked almost directly across from his parents' house, talking to a friend.
translation.zh: 停在他父母家的对面 和一个朋友聊天

translation.en: I pulled up to his house, and, um, my buddy came out.
translation.zh: 我停在他家门口 我的朋友从家里出来

translation.en: He's just in the passenger window talking to me.
translation.zh: 他探身在副驾驶一侧的窗口和我聊天

translation.en: And, uh, my girlfriend, she kind of got, like, she had a look on her face.
translation.zh: 我的女朋友 她有点 她脸上有种表情

translation.en: And, uh, there was an Expedition behind us.
translation.zh: 我们身后有一辆征服者

translation.en: And I looked at my buddy, and he was kind of getting spooked,
translation.zh: 我看看我的朋友 他有点儿惊慌

translation.en: and kind of backpedaling back up to the house.
translation.zh: 后退着往家走

translation.en: I did have an eerie feeling like I don't know these people. I don't…
translation.zh: 我有种异样的感觉 这些人我不认识

translation.en: I don't have these problems in life, man, you know? Um…
translation.zh: 我生活中没有这些问题

translation.en: I turned on my brights, and, uh, I just gunned it.
translation.zh: 我打开车前灯 一脚油门开了出去

translation.en: [Robbie] I thought I'd hit them or the curb,
translation.zh: 我以为我会撞到他们或者路牙

translation.en: like something was bound to go wrong. And I slid around the corner.
translation.zh: 好像一定会出什么事 我飞快地转过街角

translation.en: And immediately they started chasing me.
translation.zh: 他们立刻开始追我

translation.en: [Rick] You were not in an SUV that night?
translation.zh: 那天晚上 你不在那辆SUV里？

translation.en: -[Robbie] No. -[Rick] Absolutely not?
translation.zh: -不在 -肯定不在？

translation.en: I can't tell you how many people saw two SUVs that night.
translation.zh: 很多人那天晚上看见两辆SUV 罗伯特 你要知道 我是来帮助你家人的

translation.en: Realize, Robert, that I am here to help your family.
translation.zh: 罗伯特 你要知道 我是来帮助你家人的

translation.en: That's all our jobs.
translation.zh: 这是我们的工作

translation.en: [Robbie] I'm gone. I don't think it's an issue.
translation.zh: 我跑了 你知道 我不认为这是个问题

translation.en: Whatever it was, it's gone.
translation.zh: 不管是什么 反正没了

translation.en: I head over towards my daughter's mom's house.
translation.zh: 我向我女儿的母亲家驶去

translation.en: And, uh, I get there, and I pull up, and she's all hysterical.
translation.zh: 我到了那里 停下车 她完全疯了

translation.en: [sighs] I think we started doing some follow-up on… the family.
translation.zh: 我们开始进一步向这家人了解情况

translation.en: I learned that the Lane-Theobald family had some issues back in the day.
translation.zh: 我了解到 雷恩和西奥伯德一家人 过去有些问题

translation.en: People had been arrested, in prison.
translation.zh: 有人被捕 入狱

translation.en: My boys, you know, they're boys,
translation.zh: 我那几个儿子 他们是男孩子

translation.en: and they're going to have their problems,
translation.zh: 他们会有他们的问题

translation.en: and they like to fight, and whatever they do.
translation.zh: 他们喜欢打架 惹是生非

translation.en: Even with Belinda, uh, there were drug issues in the past.
translation.zh: 就连贝林达过去也有毒品问题

translation.en: [Christy] We've been in the drug world together.
translation.zh: 我们共同经历过毒品的问题

translation.en: Using. But I don't want to say all that. Do you want me to say all that?
translation.zh: 吸毒 但我不想说 你想让我说吗？

translation.en: Well, you know, it started out a little weekend fun,
translation.zh: 你知道 一开始就是周末乐一乐

translation.en: but then became mama's little helper.
translation.zh: 然后 成了妈妈的好帮手

translation.en: It was like that's how you go to work and work two jobs,
translation.zh: 支撑着你去打工 同时做两份工作

translation.en: and take care of five kids, and the house.
translation.zh: 照料五个孩子和这个家

translation.en: It was meth. Meth, the devil dope.
translation.zh: 是冰毒 冰毒 魔鬼毒品

translation.en: Go to work, take your line, you know? Come home from work. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 去上班 工作 下班回家

translation.en: I mean, kids were always around, but not seeing.
translation.zh: 孩子们总是在旁边 但他们看不见

translation.en: They weren't seeing that. We weren't doing drugs in front of the kids.
translation.zh: 他们看不见 我们不当着孩子的面吸毒

translation.en: Uh…
translation.zh: （安波 克莉斯托的挚友）

translation.en: They tried to hide it as much as they could, but it was super obvious.
translation.zh: 她们尽可能回避 但是这太明显了

translation.en: Yeah, then, the bigger issue was when I was selling drugs and went to prison.
translation.zh: 更严重的问题是 我开始卖毒品 并且进了监狱

translation.en: [Rick] She's had dealings with the police in the past for her own issues,
translation.zh: 她过去曾因自己的问题 还有儿子的问题

translation.en: for her son's issues.
translation.zh: 和警察打过交道

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. I… I sold a lot. I did a lot of damage out there.
translation.zh: 是啊 我卖过很多 我在外面造成了很多伤害

translation.en: All of Riverside, I… I did.
translation.zh: 整个河滨市 我到处都卖过

translation.en: I've put a lot of drugs on the streets. A lot.
translation.zh: 很多毒品经我的手流入市面 很多

translation.en: And all Crystal ever asked her, all the time when she was younger,
translation.zh: 克莉斯托小时候请求她妈妈

translation.en: was, "Mom, please, quit using. Please, please, please."
translation.zh: “妈妈 戒掉吧 求你了”

translation.en: So now the idea of who might be responsible for this
translation.zh: 现在 谁有可能是责任人

translation.en: opens up a little bit more.
translation.zh: 有了多种可能

translation.en: That, is it something from somebody's past issues in prison?
translation.zh: 会不会是某人过去坐牢时 卷入过什么麻烦？

translation.en: Is it somebody's past issues with gangs?
translation.zh: 是不是某人过去和黑帮有瓜葛？

translation.en: Is it somebody owed somebody money, or drugs, or, you know,
translation.zh: 某人欠了谁的钱或者毒品

translation.en: all of a sudden now the world of possibility opens up even further,
translation.zh: 可能性一下子变得更多了

translation.en: because there's this compromising situation with the victim family.
translation.zh: 因为死者家属的情况对他们不利

translation.en: [Jaimie] Every day. Get out of school, walk straight home.
translation.zh: 每天一放学直接回家

translation.en: Hours upon hours.
translation.zh: 一连好几个小时

translation.en: From three o'clock in the afternoon till one o'clock in the morning,
translation.zh: 从下午三点到凌晨一点

translation.en: I'd be on there.
translation.zh: 一直在网上

translation.en: I think it got harder for me
translation.zh: 贝林达姨妈想出一个主意 给克莉斯托创建一个聚友网资料页

translation.en: when my Aunt Belinda came up with the idea of making Crystal a MySpace.
translation.zh: 贝林达姨妈想出一个主意 给克莉斯托创建一个聚友网资料页 我的工作更有难度了

translation.en: [Belinda] Rebecca just wasn't getting us enough hits
translation.zh: 我们想要调查那些人

translation.en: from the ones that we were interested in.
translation.zh: 瑞贝卡不能搞到足够的信息

translation.en: And so I asked her, "Can you put Crystal's picture up there?"
translation.zh: 于是我问她：“你能把 克莉斯托的照片放上去吗？”

translation.en: [Jaimie] I said, "Crystal. Why do you want to make Crystal a MySpace?"
translation.zh: 我说：“克莉斯托 你为什么 要给她做一个聚友网资料页？”

translation.en: Make them fall in love with her.
translation.zh: 让他们爱上她

translation.en: [Belinda] We decided to name her Angel.
translation.zh: 我们决定给她取名天使

translation.en: And I wrote on her profile
translation.zh: 我在她个人简介里写上

translation.en: that I was going to be their biggest life mistake
translation.zh: 我会成为他们一生犯下的最大的错误

translation.en: and their deepest, darkest, best-kept secret.
translation.zh: 他们埋藏最深的、最黑暗的隐秘

translation.en: And, boy, they just started responding.
translation.zh: 他们开始回应了

translation.en: It's like, boy, just left then right, ping, ping, ping.
translation.zh: 四面八方 叮叮叮

translation.en: I'd be on there switching back and forth. I'd have two pages open.
translation.zh: 我在网上不停地来回跳转 开着两个网页

translation.en: I would just minimize one, go to Angel, minimize the other, go to Rebecca.
translation.zh: 一会儿把这个最小化 上天使的页面 一会儿把那个最小化 上瑞贝卡页面

translation.en: My Supergirl. She wasn't making them fall in love.
translation.zh: 我的超女 没能让他们爱上

translation.en: She was more or less a booty call, you know?
translation.zh: 她基本上只能是偶尔被玩玩

translation.en: Crystal was the love.
translation.zh: 克莉斯托是真爱

translation.en: Rebecca pried a lot, was nosy.
translation.zh: 瑞贝卡爱打听 问这问那

translation.en: Like, "Oh, tell me this, tell me that." It was very, very flirty.
translation.zh: “告诉我这个 告诉我那个” 爱撩人

translation.en: And, like, teenager-y.
translation.zh: 有少女的性格

translation.en: Like, "Oh, today was a shitty day." Like, "Uh, school sucks."
translation.zh: “今天真倒霉” “学校真差劲”

translation.en: Like, a little sad face and stuff.
translation.zh: 再来个难过的表情符

translation.en: Angel's was always upbeat and sweet.
translation.zh: 天使总是矜持和美丽

translation.en: She had good fonts. She had big fonts.
translation.zh: 她的字体漂亮 有的字很大

translation.en: Little fonts, pink fonts, blue fonts, sparkly fonts. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 有的字小 有粉字、蓝色字、闪光字

translation.en: [Belinda] It wasn't long.
translation.zh: 没多久

translation.en: The profile had just barely been up when William Sotelo responded.
translation.zh: 个人资料刚做好 威廉斯泰洛就回应了

translation.en: He doesn't watch movies. He watches porn.
translation.zh: 他不看电影 他看黄片

translation.en: He doesn't read books. It was, "eff books."
translation.zh: 他不读书 他鄙视读书

translation.en: And he's standing in his profile.
translation.zh: 他在个人首页上宣称：

translation.en: "I'm from 5150, and I'm down to kill."
translation.zh: “我是5150成员 我会杀人”

translation.en: So I just got tunnel vision on Sotelo.
translation.zh: 我立刻盯上了斯泰洛

translation.en: I mainly talked to him.
translation.zh: 我主要和他聊天

translation.en: He was very adamant about 5150 on MySpace.
translation.zh: 他在聚友网上是个坚定的5150分子

translation.en: [Belinda] Jaimie's putting in messages. He's sending messages back.
translation.zh: 杰米给他发信息 他也回信息

translation.en: "Well, what do you do besides party and drink?"
translation.zh: “除了参加聚会 喝酒 你还干什么？”

translation.en: I'm not really the party girl, once in a while.
translation.zh: 我不是那种派对女孩 只是偶尔去玩

translation.en: "No, no, no, that's not my thing. I have goals."
translation.zh: “不 我也不喜欢 我有目标

translation.en: "I'll show you. I'm gonna be somebody."
translation.zh: 我会让你看到 我会出人头地的”

translation.en: When you want someone to want you, you play with them.
translation.zh: 如果你想让人对你有意思 你就要逗引他

translation.en: And I did what Crystal taught me to do, um, make the boy come to you.
translation.zh: 我用上了克莉斯托教我的招术 吸引男孩来追

translation.en: [Belinda] We told him, uh, Angel's mom's in prison for cooking meth.
translation.zh: 我们告诉他 天使的妈妈 因为制造冰毒进了监狱

translation.en: And I thought maybe that'd get them to open up a bit about drugs or prison.
translation.zh: 我想 这也许会 引他在毒品和监狱的事上多说几句

translation.en: [Belinda] He came back opposite of what I would've thought.
translation.zh: （笑话：唉 你的遭遇真不幸） 他的反应和我的预料正相反

translation.en: [Belinda] It got deep. It was like, "Wow."
translation.zh: 聊得很深了 真没想到

translation.en: His messages, he was getting more sweet.
translation.zh: 他在那些留言里变得格外体贴

translation.en: [Jaimie] How he wanted to give me the world
translation.zh: 他说想给我整个世界

translation.en: and make sure nothing else got in the way of it.
translation.zh: 不让任何事成为我们的羁绊

translation.en: [Jaimie] I have this picture of Crystal in my head.
translation.zh: 我头脑中有克莉斯托的形象

translation.en: [sniffs] I really had to portray that.
translation.zh: 我得把她的形象表现出来

translation.en: [voice breaks] I had to show him she was a beautiful person.
translation.zh: 我要让他看到 她是个美女

translation.en: She was hard not to fall in love with.
translation.zh: 很难不爱上她

translation.en: You'd meet her, you'd fall in love with her.
translation.zh: 见到她的人都会爱上她

translation.en: [sniffles] Her personality, her smile.
translation.zh: 她的性格 她的笑容

translation.en: It was hard not for that guy to fall in love with her.
translation.zh: 那个人很难不爱上她

translation.en: [Jaimie] He said, "Hey, girl, I'm having a party tonight. You want to come?"
translation.zh: 他说：“嘿 姑娘 我今晚举办派对 你来吗？”

translation.en: [Belinda] "What's up? I'm ready tonight. You don't have a car, I'll come get you."
translation.zh: “怎么样？我今晚准备好了 你要是没车 我可以去接你”

translation.en: We're like, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 我们说 不行

translation.en: They wanna meet me. "What do I do?"
translation.zh: 他们想见面 我怎么办？

translation.en: And she goes, "Well, well, tell him yes."
translation.zh: 她说：“告诉他可以”

translation.en: "And then send him a message, like, at the very last minute."
translation.zh: “然后 临到最后一分钟

translation.en: "And say you can't make it."
translation.zh: 告诉他 你去不了”

translation.en: And then, like, an hour later, I was like, "Damn, I cannot find a ride."
translation.zh: 一小时后 我说：“该死 我找不到车”

translation.en: He was so adamant about trying to get me to come out that night.
translation.zh: 他非常坚决地想要约我出去

translation.en: It was more than he had ever tried before.
translation.zh: 从没有那么竭尽全力过

translation.en: "Oh, girl. I'll come pick you up then."
translation.zh: “哦 姑娘 那我去接你”

translation.en: So I was like, "Oh, so if you were to come pick me up,
translation.zh: 我说：“如果你来接我

translation.en: what car am I supposed to look for?"
translation.zh: 那么你开什么车？”

translation.en: [Rick] That white truck, was there anything that stood out about it?
translation.zh: 那辆白色SUV 它有什么特别之处？

translation.en: Like, was it lowered, or have some kind of special rims on it, anything at all?
translation.zh: 底盘是否降低了？ 轮毂是不是特制的？

translation.en: [Belinda] It was an Expedition. I don't know what make that is.
translation.zh: 是一辆征服者 我不知道是什么牌子

translation.en: -[Rick] Okay. -[Belinda] If that's a Ford or what.
translation.zh: -好 -也许是福特什么的

translation.en: Belinda knew enough that I was looking for a particular kind of vehicle.
translation.zh: 贝林达知道我在找一辆车

translation.en: An Expedition.
translation.zh: 一辆征服者

translation.en: It was a white color, but it also had some gold accent here and there.
translation.zh: 是一辆白色的车 但也有几处金色

translation.en: And I was looking for the 5150 gang member who had that car.
translation.zh: 我在找那个开这种车的5150黑帮成员

translation.en: I went ahead and called Detective Wheeler and told him,
translation.zh: 我给维勒探员打电话 告诉他：

translation.en: "Look, this is what I found out, and I think we found him."
translation.zh: “我有线索了 我想我们找到他了

translation.en: "This is who they are."
translation.zh: 就是这个人”

translation.en: [Rick] I remember her calling me saying, "Jokes. It was his car."
translation.zh: 我记得她给我打电话 说： “笑话 是他的车

translation.en: "Jokes drove that car. It was him."
translation.zh: 是笑话开的那辆车 是他”

translation.en: That's also where the MySpace account started to come into play. Um…
translation.zh: 这个聚友网账号开始进入我的视野

translation.en: At the beginning, I told her,
translation.zh: 一开始 我对她说：“你要是早告诉我

translation.en: "I wish you would've told me you were starting this."
translation.zh: 一开始 我对她说：“你要是早告诉我 你在做这个就好了 我也好事先知道”

translation.en: "So I would've known ahead of time."
translation.zh: 你在做这个就好了 我也好事先知道”

translation.en: But, uh, rolling through the comments from these various guys
translation.zh: 但我浏览了这些人的留言

translation.en: that were just head over heels for this girl.
translation.zh: 他们都迷上了这个姑娘

translation.en: I mean, they… A pretty lady, a pretty girl,
translation.zh: 我是说 他们…一个漂亮的女士 一个漂亮姑娘

translation.en: and her talking to them the way that, that she was.
translation.zh: 用那种方式和他们聊天

translation.en: It was no wonder they got lured in. It's a great way to set it up.
translation.zh: 难怪他们都上钩了 是一条妙计

translation.en: So my next thought is, I got to get a hold of William Sotelo, Jokes.
translation.zh: 所以我想 我要找到这个威廉斯泰洛 “笑话”

translation.en: If he in fact is the driver, he should be able to tell me who else was in the car.
translation.zh: 如果他真是那个司机 那他应该能告诉我 车上还有谁 他应该能告诉我 是谁开的枪

translation.en: He should be able to tell me who the shooter is.
translation.zh: 车上还有谁 他应该能告诉我 是谁开的枪

translation.en: [Rick] Okay. All right, Will.
translation.zh: 好的 威尔

translation.en: We'll get you right back here once we're all finished up.
translation.zh: 完事之后我们送你回这里来

translation.en: He was in the Job Corps.
translation.zh: 他加入了就业工作团

translation.en: You're doing your GED. I know what that means.
translation.zh: 我知道你在考同等学力证书 我知道那是什么意思

translation.en: -What are you doing as far as the cooking? -[Will] Pantry cook.
translation.zh: -你在学厨师？具体做什么？ -凉菜厨师

translation.en: [Rick] He was supposedly studying to be a chef.
translation.zh: 他好像是在学厨师

translation.en: That's cool, man. That's better than what you were doing.
translation.zh: 很好啊 比你先前做的事要好

translation.en: -[Will] Yeah. -[Rick] Big time.
translation.zh: -是啊 -好多了

translation.en: We talked all the way back from San Bernardino to Riverside.
translation.zh: 从圣伯纳迪诺回河滨市一路上 我们聊了很多

translation.en: All right. You wanted a water? See if you can get one for him?
translation.zh: 好的 你想喝点水？ 你去给他拿杯水好吗？

translation.en: -Sorry about that. -[Will] No problem.
translation.zh: -不好意思 -没关系

translation.en: Your name has popped up in a case that I'm working. Okay?
translation.zh: 我调查的一个案件中 你的名字引起了我们的注意

translation.en: -Case? -[Rick] Yeah.
translation.zh: -案件？ -对

translation.en: In an investigation that I'm doing.
translation.zh: 在我的调查中

translation.en: What is it? Gang members, or…?
translation.zh: 什么事？黑帮成员 还是…？

translation.en: [Rick] Well, it's got to do with 5150. There's a girl that got shot.
translation.zh: 和5150帮有关 有个女孩被枪杀了

translation.en: -Girl? -[Rick] Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 女孩？

translation.en: The thing that I need to ask you about, though, is your… your car.
translation.zh: 不过我要问你的 关系到你的车

translation.en: Your Ford Expedition was identified as being there.
translation.zh: 有人看见你的福特征服者出现在现场

translation.en: [Will] Was it mine? With the license plates? I don't know.
translation.zh: 是我的车？有车牌？我不知道

translation.en: [Rick] Yeah, your car was there.
translation.zh: 对 你的车在现场

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -[Rick] And…
translation.zh: 这是什么时候的事？

translation.en: -When was this? -[Rick] Back in February.
translation.zh: 这是什么时候的事？ 二月

translation.en: -Back in February? -[Rick] Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 二月？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: [Rick] Yeah, you do, man.
translation.zh: 不 你知道

translation.en: When he would give me things that were denials
translation.zh: 他矢口否认

translation.en: or, um, he'd refute evidence I had, I would just keep pushing him back into,
translation.zh: 对我的证据予以反驳 我不断追问

translation.en: "It's not a question of whether you were there. I know you were there."
translation.zh: “不是你在不在场的问题 我知道你在

translation.en: "I want to know why."
translation.zh: 我想知道为什么”

translation.en: Nobody else in 5150 or anyone else in that area drives that car but you.
translation.zh: 5150帮或那一带的人没有开那种车的 只有你

translation.en: Every time I talk about Jokes, it's always that car.
translation.zh: 我每次谈到笑话 都是为了那辆车

translation.en: -Jokes? Uh-huh. -[Rick] Uh-huh. That's you.
translation.zh: -笑话？ -嗯 就是你啊

translation.en: Now is the time that you really need to be straight up with me
translation.zh: 现在 你真的需要对我实话实说

translation.en: because I am your only ally right now.
translation.zh: 因为你现在只有我这么一个朋友

translation.en: I think after a while that wore him down.
translation.zh: 我想 他最后终于扛不住了

translation.en: The problem is if you sit and tell me, "I wasn't there…"
translation.zh: 问题是 如果你对我说：“我不在场…”

translation.en: All right, like, I'll say the truth, but--
translation.zh: 好吧 我说实话 但是…

translation.en: [Rick] That's what I want you to tell me. The truth.
translation.zh: 这就是我想要的 你把实话告诉我

translation.en: I wasn't involved in it. It just happened.
translation.zh: 但我没参与 它就是发生了

translation.en: [Rick] Tell me. Tell me what happened.
translation.zh: 告诉我 告诉我发生了什么

translation.en: [Will] I don't know. We were just cruising.
translation.zh: （枪击案发生七分钟前） 我也不知道 我们只是开着车 在拉特兰边上兜风

translation.en: Like, driving around by Rutland.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 我们只是开着车 在拉特兰边上兜风

translation.en: [Rick] Rutland Park? Is that 5150 territory,
translation.zh: 拉特兰公园？那是5150的领地

translation.en: or isn't that close to MD territory?
translation.zh: 或者是临近MD帮的领地？

translation.en: [Will] Yes, that's MD's territory.
translation.zh: 对 那是MD帮的领地

translation.en: [Rick] And everybody's piled into your Expedition?
translation.zh: 大家都挤在你的征服者车里？

translation.en: [Will] It was full, probably like seven people in the car.
translation.zh: 车里坐满了 可能有七个人

translation.en: This white Expedition passed quick, almost hit my truck.
translation.zh: 然后 一辆白色征服者飞快地 从旁边驶过 差点撞到我的车

translation.en: He cuts us off, like, whoosh.
translation.zh: 他嗖地一下插到我们前面

translation.en: Almost, like, this close to hitting the truck.
translation.zh: 差这么一点就撞上我了

translation.en: "This is where we were when we saw the SUV Robert was driving."
translation.zh: “我们就是在这儿看见 罗伯特开的那辆SUV的

translation.en: "This is where we stopped when the cars drove up on us."
translation.zh: 那两辆车开过来时 我们停在这儿”

translation.en: And then they started…
translation.zh: 然后 他们开始…

translation.en: The… The white Expedition started shooting at the car, at my truck.
translation.zh: 白色征服者车里的人 开始朝我的车开枪

translation.en: -[Rick] They shot at your truck? -[Will] Yeah.
translation.zh: -他们朝你的车开枪？ -对

translation.en: I was gonna take off, and Lil Huero's like, "Just stop."
translation.zh: 我想跑 小胡埃罗说：“停下”

translation.en: -He got out. -[Rick] Okay.
translation.zh: -他下了车 -哦

translation.en: So Little Huero gets out, right?
translation.zh: 小胡埃罗下了车？ （胡里奥赫莱迪亚 外号“小胡埃罗”）

translation.en: Where did he walk to? Did he walk to--?
translation.zh: 他朝哪儿走？他是在走向…？

translation.en: I don't know. I started ducking. There was bullets everywhere.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我不敢抬头 子弹乱飞

translation.en: [Rick] That's pretty ballsy to get out if somebody is shooting at you.
translation.zh: 有人朝你们开枪 还敢下车 胆子不小啊

translation.en: Pretty ballsy to get out of the car.
translation.zh: 还敢下车 胆子不小

translation.en: He's crazy. He's psycho. It's weird.
translation.zh: 他疯了 他神经病 很奇怪

translation.en: [Rick] What did you see in the car with the girl inside when it went by?
translation.zh: 那个女孩乘坐的汽车驶过时 你在车里看见了什么？

translation.en: -I don't know. -Did it look like it got hit?
translation.zh: 它中弹了吗？

translation.en: -It did. -[Rick] It have bullet holes in it?
translation.zh: -中弹了 -车身有弹孔？

translation.en: No, like the window was shattered.
translation.zh: 不 车窗碎了

translation.en: [Rick] Which window?
translation.zh: 哪扇车窗？

translation.en: The front… The front, like, um, passenger side.
translation.zh: 前面 乘客一侧

translation.en: [Rick] Okay. And you said you were getting shot at? Did your car get hit?
translation.zh: 好 你说他们朝你们开枪？ 你的车中弹了吗？

translation.en: No. Um, I don't think it got hit.
translation.zh: 我觉得没有

translation.en: [Rick] That's close for them not to hit you.
translation.zh: 那么近 他们却没打中

translation.en: -I'd have thought you've been hit. -I don't know.
translation.zh: -我以为你们会中弹的 -我不知道

translation.en: [Rick] And we had no bullet strikes in William's SUV, no shell casings,
translation.zh: 威廉的SUV上没有弹痕 没有弹壳

translation.en: no weapons that were found within the Theobald household.
translation.zh: 西奥伯德家没有发现枪械

translation.en: And lacking that evidence, I don't have anything to substantiate
translation.zh: 缺少证据 我无法证明

translation.en: that they were fired at by the Theobald family.
translation.zh: 西奥伯德家的人曾朝他们开枪

translation.en: Okay, when did you see Little Huero again?
translation.zh: 你再次看见小胡埃罗是什么时候？

translation.en: I never saw him. I never heard from him or saw him ever again.
translation.zh: 我再没见过他 再没见过他 或听到他的消息

translation.en: -[Rick] No? -Mm-mm.
translation.zh: 没有？

translation.en: [Rick] They had not had contact with him, Julio Heredia.
translation.zh: 他们没有和胡里奥赫莱迪亚再联系过

translation.en: They hadn't seen him. He wasn't out doing the crimes that he'd been doing.
translation.zh: 他们没再见过他 他没有继续出去 进行他一贯的作案

translation.en: So, Little Huero, Julio Heredia,

translation.zh: -我不会告诉小胡埃罗的 -好吧

translation.en: Um, this is William Lemus Junior, and his nickname was Little Rascal.

translation.en: At school, gangs were aiming for little kids,

translation.en: to take them in when they were little.

translation.en: I wasn't with it. I told them, "They're too young."

translation.en: And they looked at me and said, "How do you think we got you in?"
translation.zh: 他们看看我 说： “你以为我们是怎么把你拉进来的？”

translation.en: [Manuel] I went to their house party, and I liked everything that they did.

translation.en: And that house was full of people.

translation.en: Loud music playing.

translation.en: But at that moment, I felt like this is where I wanted to be.
translation.zh: 但那一刻 我觉得 这就是我想来的地方

translation.en: Next thing you know, I got a guy in a bike coming up to me.

translation.en: I remember beginning of school year,

translation.en: somebody said that the guy on the bike is the one that shoots you.

translation.en: Julio.
translation.zh: 胡里奥

translation.en: He's like, "Right on. Give him a beer."

translation.en: I don't drink.
translation.zh: 我不喝酒

translation.en: "Do you want to be in, or no?"
translation.zh: “你想不想加入？”

translation.en: "Yeah."
"Get him some weed."
translation.zh: “给他点大麻”

translation.en: "I don't smoke."
translation.zh: “我不抽大麻”

translation.en: "You want to be in? Do this. You want to be in? Do that."
translation.zh: “你想加入？那就做这个 你想加入？那就做那个”

translation.en: Puts up his hand and said, "Get him."
translation.zh: 抬起一只手 说了声：“抓住他”

translation.en: [Manuel] One of the kids grabbed me, tackled me to the floor,
translation.zh: 一个小孩抓住我 把我放倒在地

translation.en: speared me to the floor down.
translation.zh: 把我按在地上

translation.en: And then, like, you're in.

translation.en: And they just started hugging me, holding me.
translation.zh: 他们开始拥抱我

translation.en: "We'll get your back whenever anything happens."
translation.zh: “不管什么时候发生什么事 有我们罩着你”

translation.en: Next thing in school, they want me to hang out with them.
translation.zh: 接下来 他们邀我一起玩

translation.en: They want me to be around their table.
translation.zh: 他们让我和他们坐在一起

translation.en: And then I was like, "Hey, I'm making it in now."
translation.zh: （马里奥） 我想 嘿 我加入了

translation.en: The way I felt was,
translation.zh: 我觉得

translation.en: "Why should I be scared?"
translation.zh: 我为什么要害怕？

translation.en: "Shouldn't I feel safe?"
translation.zh: 我不应该感到安全吗？

translation.en: Have that feeling that no one will come after me.

translation.en: I'm with the ones that come after people.
translation.zh: 我和那些欺负我的人是一伙了

translation.en: We lived very peacefully there. Very peacefully.
translation.zh: 我们在那里过着平静的生活 非常平静

translation.en: There were never any problems, nothing, nothing.
translation.zh: 什么问题也没有 没有

translation.en: All those guys were his friends because they were all from the same neighborhood.
translation.zh: 那些人都是他的朋友 因为他们都来自同一个社区

translation.en: They were his friends.
translation.zh: 他们是他的朋友

translation.en: They seemed so innocent.
translation.zh: 他们看起来好单纯

translation.en: They showed me respect. They didn't use bad language.
translation.zh: 他们对我很尊敬 从不说脏话

translation.en: And I had no idea what a big problem that was.
translation.zh: 我当时不知道那是一个怎样的大麻烦

translation.en: It wasn't done yet. That's why I stayed on for so long.
translation.zh: 还没完呢 所以我一直在线那么久

translation.en: That's why I never got off
translation.zh: 所以我从不下线

translation.en: because I still had a lot more to do.
translation.zh: 因为还有很多事要做

translation.en: [Jaimie] I really tried to be Crystal.
translation.zh: 我真的很努力地扮演克莉斯托

translation.en: Making someone fall in love with someone who's dead is not a good feeling inside.

translation.en: When I was messaging as Angel…

translation.en: pretending to be her,
translation.zh: 假装是她

translation.en: I was really, really keeping her alive in my heart.
translation.zh: 我其实是让她继续活在我心里

translation.en: I was with her again all night long.
translation.zh: 整个晚上 我又能和她在一起了

translation.en: Staying up late.
translation.zh: 熬夜

translation.en: I think that's what made it difficult at the end.
translation.zh: 我想 说到底这才是最难的

translation.en: It just… It felt like I was…
translation.zh: 感觉好像我…

translation.en: stuck pretending to be her.
translation.zh: 不得不继续假冒她 无法自拔

translation.en: She wasn't here anymore. It was hard to look at her face every day.
translation.zh: 而她已经不在了 每天看着她的脸 真的很难

translation.en: [Jaimie] That's when the MySpace got hard for me.
translation.zh: 继续上聚友网变得好难

translation.en: I said I was done.
translation.zh: 我说我不干了

translation.en: I couldn't do it anymore.
translation.zh: 我不能再装下去了

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I was so… I was very depressed, very depressed. Uh…
translation.zh: 是啊 我好… 我非常抑郁

translation.en: I said, "Why isn't William Sotelo in custody?"
translation.zh: 我说：“威廉斯泰洛 怎么还没被抓起来？”

translation.en: After they find out everything, and he admits to it.
translation.zh: 他们查明了一切 他也承认了

translation.en: [Justin] Everything has a breaking point, sooner or later.

translation.en: Like a jar, all this stuff going in.
translation.zh: 好比一只罐子 什么都往里面装

translation.en: There's no release valve. It just keeps going in,

translation.en: and the jar is starting to crack.
translation.zh: 罐子就会裂开

translation.en: And stuff's starting to come out with nowhere to go.

translation.en: [Rick] I understand how the streets work. You want to handle this.
translation.zh: 我知道街头的规矩 你们想处理这事

translation.en: Your brothers want to handle this shit.
translation.zh: 你那几个兄弟想要处理

translation.en: -Enough harm's been done. -[Justin] Right.
translation.zh: -但已经有够多伤害了 -对

translation.en: [Rick] You don't need to go back to jail. Your brothers don't need to.
translation.zh: 好吧？你不需要再次入狱 你的兄弟们也不需要

translation.en: Your mom doesn't need this kind of anguish, so…

translation.en: I know her boys weren't exactly interested in us
translation.zh: 我知道她儿子并不想

translation.en: bringing the resolution about.
translation.zh: 让我们解决问题

translation.en: They were used to handling things their way.
translation.zh: 他们习惯了用自己的方式处理事情

translation.en: And that wasn't going to be good for anybody.

translation.en: Are your sons, uh, wanting to take care of this themselves?

translation.en: -[Belinda] No. -[Rick] No? Okay. Good.
translation.zh: -不是 -不是？好 那很好

translation.en: Yeah, we don't… We don't need that.
translation.zh: 是啊 我们不… 我们不需要那样

translation.en: Only because of a promise to my mother
translation.zh: 我们没有去做我们想做的事

translation.en: did we not pursue what we felt we wanted to.
translation.zh: 仅仅因为对我母亲的一个承诺

translation.en: Okay, everybody, no violence. Not in my daughter's name.
translation.zh: 大家听好了 不能使用暴力 以我女儿的名义 禁止使用暴力

translation.en: But in the back of my own mind, I still knew I was going to kill him.
translation.zh: 但在我内心里 我还是知道我会杀了他

translation.en: And so I took over the site then because after so many months,

translation.en: you begin to wonder, "My God, are they ever going to get him?"

translation.en: And I just go into the zone with this anger.

translation.en: Everything I could learn about their family.

translation.en: the license plate numbers.

translation.en: If there was a problem I could bring to one of them, I would.

translation.en: with a million pins in it.

translation.en: Belinda was just kind of, uh, psycho, you know?

translation.en: In her own little world. And, uh…

translation.en: loved her to death because she's… You know, but she can be crazy.

translation.en: Bangin' on the mic and shit, MySpace…

translation.zh: 我说：“贱人 你们想找我？

translation.en: "Take the 91 Freeway."
translation.zh: 走91号高速

translation.en: "Exit at La Sierra. Turn right."
translation.zh: 在拉西埃拉出口出来 右转

translation.en: "And I drive the white Ford Expedition, bitch."

translation.en: What we did was great, but this is gonna screw stuff up

translation.en: if now, you start threatening them, start doing things

translation.en: that will draw any kind of sympathy on their part.

translation.en: Detective Wheeler came and said,
translation.zh: 维勒探员来说：

translation.en: "There's been an exceptionally large number of white Ford Expeditions
translation.zh: “有很多起报案 说是白色福特征服者

translation.en: that are being shot up and burned up and vandalized."
translation.zh: 被枪击 被焚烧 或被破坏”

translation.en: I just don't want there to be any loose cannons out there
translation.zh: 我们不希望任何人随便搞破坏 制造危险

translation.en: that can throw a wrench in everything.

translation.en: He goes, "I think you need to knock off all your bullshit."

translation.en: "And stay off the Internet, and let us do our job."

translation.en: And I'm like, "Okay. Yeah, right. Sounds good."

translation.en: Sounds like I'm getting somewhere with something,

translation.en: Last thing I was going to do is back off.

translation.en: "Smoking a big one," and, "We're all partying." You know?
translation.zh: “抽一大支” “我们都在狂欢呢” 你懂吧？

translation.en: And then I got to thinking, party.
translation.zh: 我灵机一动 派对

translation.en: saying Angel's having an End of the World party on 6/6/06,

translation.en: and I'm not gonna tell you where the party's gonna be

translation.en: till six o'clock that night.

translation.en: She was having this party. Something about some party.

translation.zh: 穿过佩里斯 有条路叫莱德路

translation.en: Here's where the story gets even trippier.
translation.zh: 在这里 故事变得更加魔幻了

translation.en: [Belinda] Someplace where I can see them coming in, but they not see me.
translation.zh: 在一个我可以看见他们过来 但他们看不见我的地方

translation.en: And I just… Yeah.
translation.zh: 而我就…对

translation.en: [Christy] She says, "You won't believe what I'm doing."
translation.zh: 她说：“你绝对不会相信我要干什么”

translation.en: I go, "I know this is what you want to do, but I thought it was insane."
translation.zh: 我知道你想这么做 但我真的觉得这是疯了

translation.en: [interviewer] Who was gonna do the shooting?

translation.en: Oh, I was gonna shoot them. I was gonna… That was mine.
translation.zh: 哦 我是打算朝他们开枪的 我会的 那是我的机会

translation.en: They were mine. I was gonna shoot them myself.
translation.zh: 他们是我的 我准备亲自动手

translation.en: Yeah, I had a plan, and I had a gun.
translation.zh: 是的 我有个计划 我有把枪

translation.en: -[interviewer] Are you a good shot? -I wasn't gonna be that far.
translation.zh: 你枪法准吗？ 我不会离得太远

translation.en: Just have him pull in and just up on the top,
translation.zh: 只等他开过来 上到山顶

translation.en: and figure we'd get the drop on them.
translation.zh: 我想我可以给他们来个出其不意

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: And it was gonna be the end of their world.

translation.en: [Robbie] I remember coming home, and, uh…
translation.zh: 记得我回到家 她…

translation.en: yeah, she was headed out. She was determined.
translation.zh: 是的 她正要出去 她很坚决

translation.en: Regardless what it was, it was gonna make her feel better.
translation.zh: 不管是去干什么 那会让她感觉好些

translation.en: And that's what she wanted, you know? Um…
translation.zh: 而那就是她想要的 你知道吧？

translation.zh: 我丈夫和我儿子们都说： “妈妈 别管了

translation.en: "You need to stop."
translation.zh: 停手吧”

translation.en: [Robbie] We weren't gonna let her act on it.
translation.zh: 我们不会让她真的那么做

translation.en: It was like we were gonna lose our mom, you know?
translation.zh: 那样做等于我们要失去我们的妈妈了 你知道吧？

translation.en: I made a plan to go murder people. I made a plan to go murder people.
translation.zh: 我制定了一个杀人计划

translation.en: Let that sink in a minute.
translation.zh: 想想这句话意味着什么

translation.en: You're suicidal, or you're homicidal, you're just…

translation.en: You don't care, but you care too much.
translation.zh: 你不在乎 但你又太在乎了

translation.en: [Belinda] It was just, uh, the day before.
translation.zh: 那是在前一天

translation.en: I'm not gonna hurt him. I'm not gonna kill him.
translation.zh: 我不会伤害他 我不会杀死他 （亲爱的姑娘 ）

translation.en: But I was just at the computer,
translation.zh: （迫不及待地 想在明天的聚会上见到你） 但我坐在电脑前

translation.zh: 止不住地哭
